answers.answer: I hope it isnt exact! At 17 weeks my baby was measuring 10 oz he would be a huge baby! I have another ultrasound on Monday to check again to see if I should be tested for GD early
At 39 weeks my son was said to be about 11 pounds! He ended up weighing 8 pounds 8 ounces.

They can be quite a bit off, and have been in my case, my SIL's baby was estimated over 9lbs, she was 7 1/2, my son was estimated under 7, and he was almost 9..so they can be quite a bit off. Imagine weighing someone in a pool of water, it's definitely not going to be spot on accurate.

question: I have gestational diabetes and was sent for an ultrasound to check on the size of my baby. I was told at my last scan (28w) that he was bigger than average. Today's scan showed he is roughly about 5lb 9oz (give or take 400gs just incase). How spot on were all your birth weights compared to the doctors estimates?? I'm currently 36weeks.
title: Estimated Baby weight always about right?
